DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective was to assess the acceptability of a 4-week treatment of 4 new fixed-dose combinations of fenofibrate and metformin, in patients with type 2 diabetes and dyslipidemia.
DOC.brief_title: Acceptability of a Fixed Combination of Fenofibrate and Metformin
